text: unhen jab hamaaree spashtî€¼ aayaten padhakar sunaee jaatee hai to ve kahate hai, "yah to bas aisa vyakti hai jo chaahata hai ki tumhen unase rok den jinako tumhaare baap-daada poojate rahe hai." aur kahate hai, "yah to ek ghada hua jhooth hai." jin logon ne inakaar kiya unhonne saty ke vishay mein, jabaki vah unake paas aaya, kah diya, "yah to bas ek pratyaksh jaadoo hai.
